game.name: Pet Simulator X
game.creator: BIG Games
game.description: Pet Simulator X is a Roblox simulator game where players collect pets, hatch eggs, break objects for coins, and progress through worlds by upgrading pets and unlocking new areas.

mechanics.pet_collection: Players collect pets by hatching eggs using coins or gems.
mechanics.pet_upgrades: Pets can be upgraded to deal more damage and earn more currency.
mechanics.enchantments: Pets can have enchantments that boost coins, damage, or special abilities.
mechanics.world_progression: Unlocking new worlds requires collecting enough currency and stronger pets.
mechanics.trading: Players can trade pets, gems, and items with other players.

tips: Focus on hatching eggs with the best pets available to you.
Upgrade and enchant your strongest pets first.
Use auto-farm features to earn coins faster.
Save gems for exclusive or rare pets.
